messages.aiAccuracy: When scanning receipt using AI, the AI will attempt to use these templates that you have created when deemed appropriate. Therefore, the accuracy of the AI in scanning receipts will improve as you create more templates.
messages.promptAutoGeneration: When you click on the 'Auto Generate' button, the AI will analyze your existing transaction particulars and generate a prompt message that will be used during receipt scanning to enhance accuracy.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Goal
deleteConfirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
